author: jvanzyl
msg: o Using native commands to build the SEA as the ant tar requires too much
fiddling to get perms right in arbitrarily included directories. Hopefully
this will make SEAs work on each *NIX platform as expected. Only tested

author: jvanzyl
msg: o If inclusion of the JRE is specified then make sure the generated
script uses the included JRE as JAVA_HOME.

author: jvanzyl
msg: o Adding support for the optional inclusion of the JRE for completely

msg: Let all releases, change docs, release notes,.. be driven by an releaseplan
